title: Baked Italian Cod
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons fine dry breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon dry polenta or cornmeal', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning', '1/8 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 (85g) fillets cod fish', '1 egg white, lightly beaten']
